item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
Foals almost sound like what I wished The Rapture would have sounded like if they hadn't fallen in with the electroclash crowd right before Echoes was recorded or re-recorded or whatever they did to ruin their sound between 1999 and now. Remember Olio (the original!) and Out of the Races and Onto The Tracks?!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EkzgAcTcJq8
item.content:encoded:
Foals almost sound like what I wished The Rapture would have sounded like if they hadn’t fallen in with the electroclash crowd right before Echoes was recorded or re-recorded or whatever they did to ruin their sound between 1999 and now. Remember Olio (the original!) and Out of the Races and Onto The Tracks?!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EkzgAcTcJq8
